place.name: KIRMOND LE MIRE
place.gazetteerText: KIRMOND-LE-MIRE, a parish in Caistor district, Lincoln; on the Wolds, 5½ miles NE by E of MarketRasen r. station. Post town, Market Rasen. Acres, 1, 051. Real property, £1, 083. Pop., 73. Houses, 12. The manor belongs to Turner, Esq. Bully Hill here is a lofty eminence; and much of the parish is picturesque. The living is a vicarage in the diocese of Lincoln. Value, £120. Patron,Turner, Esq. The church is very neat, and has a bell turret. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
